mapper.select: SELECT tl_tripNo, tl_country, tl_city, tl_startDate, tl_endDate, tl_tripTitle, tl_photoMenuNm, tl_regDate, tl_modDate FROM trip_list ORDER BY tl_startDate DESC
SELECT IFNULL(CONCAT('photo_', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(pl_photoNo, 7) AS UNSIGNED)) + 1, 3, '0')), 'photo_001') AS newPhotoNo FROM photo_list
SELECT pl_photoNo, pl_tripNo, pl_regDate, pl_photoFileNm FROM photo_list WHERE pl_tripNo = #{tripNo} ORDER BY pl_photoNo DESC
